body:
In-place + view are things like `t_()` and `squeeze_()`. They affect the tensor they're called on, but not other views of the tensor. i.e.

```
a = torch.randn(3, 3)
b = a[0]
a.t_() # does not affect b
```
body_html:
In-place + view are things like t_() and squeeze_(). They affect the tensor they're called on, but not other views of the tensor. i.e.

a = torch.randn(3, 3)
b = a[0]
a.t_() # does not affect b
body_text:
In-place + view are things like t_() and squeeze_(). They affect the tensor they're called on, but not other views of the tensor. i.e.
a = torch.randn(3, 3)
b = a[0]
a.t_() # does not affect b
